channel.title: Client Crashing
channel.description:
:mad:
My Client crashes when I hover the window to see my stats....
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/246onbt.png[/img]
and here is the window that shows the results of the crash...
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2dgnvnr.png[/img]
Can someone explain to me what I would have to change since I up'ed the stats to 110 instead of 99. I believe this is what's doing it...

item.title: Client Crashing
item.dc:creator: @martinfin martinfin
item.description:
@martinfin wrote:

Thanks!

Worked…

experienceArray = new int[110];

Read full topic

item.title: Client Crashing
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

ArrayIndexOutOfBounds Exception : 99

Search in mudclient to extend the array to 110.

Read full topic
